description: Related to number of elements in the free band (idempotent semigroup) on n generators.
references: J. Howie, Fundamentals of Semigroup Theory, Oxford University Press 1995, p. 123.
links: Index entries for sequences related to semigroups
formula: Binomial transform is A005345. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 22 2006a(n) = (n*a(n-1))^2 if n>0. a(0)=1. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 22 2006a(n) = Product_{i=1..n} (n-i+1)^(2^i).
prog: (PARI) {a(n)=if(n<0, 0, prod(i=1, n, (n-i+1)^2^i))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 22 2006 */(Sage)def A030450(n) :   return prod((n-i+1)^(2^i) for i in (1..n))[A030450(n) for n in (0..9)] # _Jani Melik_, Jun 06 2015
author: Marcel Jackson (marcel_j(AT)hilbert.maths.utas.edu.au)
